# +=(_:_:)

**Operator**

Appends the elements of another index path to this index path.

## Declaration

```swift
static func += (lhs: inout IndexPath, rhs: IndexPath)
```

## Adding Nodes

- **+(_:_:)**: Combines the elements of two index paths into a single index path.

items.description: Combines the elements of two index paths into a single index path.
